inn1.comm: off the mark right away, short of a length coming in on the pads, worked away to short fine leg who tumbles and stops it
good line pretty soon from Mpofu, fuller and going across close to off stump, he plays it out to covers
even better now, this one holding its line from a length around off stump, he adjusts as it comes in and pushes back towards the bowler
that will go, Mpofu provides lots of width outside off on a length, sits up, and is spanked through cover
more width, but a lot fuller, and Kayes goes after it, but the ball goes just over a leaping backward point
now he provides no width and the batsman is forced into playing in out on the leg side
and is on target first ball, darting in with the angle from over the wicket on a length, he is struck on the pad as he misses, going down leg that one
angled further in to the pads and this time he gets bat nicely on to it to pick up a couple in front of square leg
there is the away swinger, but too much outside off stump to have Tamim interested, lets it go
much better line, making him play around off stump with one that holds its line from a length, good bounce as Tamim opens the face to counter the movement and pushes to point

dear me, this is becoming a bit of a pattern now, Tamim goes after Vitori and falls again, nothing shot, as in the first match, moving away from him on a length, bouncing, biting, just a bit of width and he thinks it needs to be crunched through point, just tried to force it away, went after it without moving the feet, and first slip took it almost as if he was waiting for it
goes full on middle and leg, and he clips it in front of square leg
good carry for Mpofu, close to off stump on a fuller length, left alone straight away
goes down the pads with the angle and RAhim helps it round the corner, long leg cannot get there in time
good delivery this time, Mpofu finds bounce from back of a length, Rahim goes across, but it climbs too much and he takes it on the body
that is a nice line outside off stump, Mpofu gets it to kick from a length, Rahim is surprised as he pushes forward and is hit high on the bat
moving away a tad now from a length outside off, he stays in the crease and opens the face to run it wide of point, he has a tight technique, Rahim
more lift for Mpofu outside off, bit of away movement as well, he shoulders arms
lovely stuff from Vitori, this one nips in from a length close to off stump, left alone
moving away from outside off, similar to the one that Tamim went after, Kayes is wiser and shoulders arms
this one has to be played at, darted in with the angle fuller on off stump, and holding its line to beat Kayes as he pushes at it
just a touch outside off stump and he leaves it instantly as it moves away from a fullish length
down the leg side with the angle this time
another beauty, how do you deal with those, short of a length now and holding its line inches from off stump, you just push at those and hope you don't edge them, Kayes gets away again
fuller this time, he pushes it away watchfully with an open face to point
Mpofu continues to find sharp bounce from outside off stump, not far from the wickets too, left alone
tighter line, getting him to play with a fuller length too, bat and pad together as he shuffle across and blocks
pushed away to point from a length
gets on top of the bouncer, Mpofu bangs it in short, and he rocks back to time the pull through midwicket
fuller but on the pads, Mpofu hasn't been exactly consistent today, down to long leg with a flick
again on the pads, but a touch slower and he can't time the attempted work off the hip
good solid firm push from Rahim as he gets forward to a length ball leaving him and plays it towards extra cover
starts to hold its line but angled a touch wider, he gets well across and blocks
beaten this time, this one does not come back in, goes straight on with the angle from a length, Rahim has that late inward movement on his mind as he pushes forward inside the line
fired in full on the pads and trickles away square on the leg side
straightens a touch from a length outside off, Kayes comes forward nicely and pushes towards covers, he takes a step or two looking for the single, but there isn't any to be had
goes after a shortish and wide one that moves away, and gets it in the air but behind backward point, down to third man, there was no gully in place
Mpofu has struggled to keep up the pressure from the other end, moves in down the pads and rolls away behind square
fuller but he uses the angle in to the pads to work it through midwicket
solid forward defensive push from Rahim, length ball, he plonks front foot out, head on top of ball, crouching low as he smothers it
pushed away off the front foot to cover, decent line from Mpofu

oh well, now Rahim has given it away, why, oh why would you do that after looking in serene control, goes the way Ashraful did in the first match, not in control of the pull as Mpofu bangs it in, quickly on to him, he was not in a great position, and square leg will settle under that and take it easily
now Kayes decides to push away from his body outside off, and it goes in the air too, but fortunately for him, wide of point
wants the single, but it isn't there at all, as he pushes off the front foot to cover
forced from the crease off a length, but straight to point

suicidal tendencies spread through the Bangladesh line-up, this time Kayes thinks that a length delivery should be clattered through extra cover, he is nowhere to the pitch of the ball as he gets forward to thump it, and extra cover accepts the gift

dropped almost another one, between the two slips, pushes forward to one straightening outside off, edge right away, flies towards the slips, second dives in front of first and goes for it one-handed, and both can't get the ball in the end
left alone outside the off stump, they could do with more of that
good line outside off stump, left alone wisely
bouncing steeply from short of a length close to off, he flags it through
now the fuller one, well bowled, he does not go hard at it though, and carefully opens the face to run it to point
he had a look at this one, and thought about launching in to it, but it was not full enough, and he had to block it down the track
gets forward and guides a length ball to point
sharp bounce for Mpofu, this one has really taken off, Ashraful calmly gets head out of the way
leans forward and pushes a length ball with a straight bat, goes towards mid off
Vitori stays around that off stump from back of a length, darts it in with the angle and gets it to move away, this is remarkable control from someone so young, left alone
goes fuller now, and in to the pads, rolls away as he misses the clip
well played, gets bat down at an angle from beside the line at a length ball outside off, and guides it to third man
good one, bowled very full and right on middle and off, he blocks it back to the bowler
this is tight stuff from Vitori, he is giving nothing away, fuller and now holding its line on off, he quickly brings bat down to keep it out towards cover
now this one goes on with a bit of an angle into him, he was pushing across looking for the away movement, and somehow manages to jab it away towards point
turning on the pads from outside off, rolls away towards short fine leg
turning on middle stump, pushed back down the track
poor delivery, down the pads, flat, and helped around the corner, Price tries hard but cannot stop the ball with a desperate slide
pushed away off the back foot to extra cover
squared him up a bit as it turned away from leg stump, he adjusts to squeeze it towards point
fuller and defended tightly off the front foot
defended on the back foot
left alone outside the off stump
defended on the leg side
fuller delivery around off, he pushes half-forward and inside edges on the leg side
drives in the air away from the body, there is a man at shortish extra cover and he goes leaping to his left, but can't get to the ball
squirted off the pads towards square leg
this one didn't turn, went straight on with a bit of flight from wide of the crease, he is surprised and pokes inside the line to get beaten
another one carries on straight with the angle, he tries to play with an open face but is beaten again
pushed back down the track
defended off the front foot, a touch in the air
pushed off the front foot, tight line from Utseya
fuller one worked towards square leg with the angle
that could be close, appeal for lbw, as Vitori bends one in with the angle from a fuller length, would have gone down leg
on the pads, from a length, he is able to work it behind square leg
solid drive from Ashraful, he got behind this one alright, fullish one, he stood tall and pinged wide mid off with the shot
not much width outside off, as he tries to go for the cut initially, but then adjusts to chop it towards point
mid off is really wide, more extra cover really, and Ashraful;s confident front foot drive flies to him
fine leave outside off as he slants it with the typical left-armer's angle across Ashraful
turning from a length on off, goes back to punch to extra cover
short, flat and sitting up outside off, put away easily as he cracks it past cover, on one leg too
slowly tossed up, and turns from leg and going towards off, carefully defended
defended off the front foot to the bowler
tossed up fuller, he has bat and pad close together as he blocks
still fuller and this time he gets around to thump the drive to long off
on the pads to start with and nudged fine on the leg side
slides it in full from wide of the crease, he blocks carefully
too wide outside off stump on a length as he tries to go wide of the crease
better line, closer to off but left alone easily
another wide sprayed far outside off
tries to slant it in with the angle from wide of the crease, but gives some width outside off and is steered to third man

now then, even Elton has a wicket, they are just throwing it away, steady length ball darted across him, no need to do much with it, but he ends up pushing far away from the body, almost as if he has to, and extra cover cannot believe his luck
fuller delivery as Elton finds some zip now in the run-up and off the pitch, pushed with an open face to point
good stop at shortish extra cover as he dives to stop a well-timed drive off the front foot
pushed down the track off the back foot
gets the single with a punch down to long off
opts to play a tossed up length ball from the crease, pushes to cover
inside edge as he tries to push a tossed up ball through extra cover, gets a single in front of square leg
flighted in from wide of the crease, he gets forward and blocks it
tucked off the pads in front of square leg

they find newer ways of going down out of nowhere, nothing shot again, wide delivery outside off stump, he just has a waft at it from the crease and Taibu is delighted as he snaps it up, that's the way he fell in the first innings of the Test as well
length ball coming in with the angle, inside edge towards square leg as he defends
is that a drop? Mahmudullah gets away as he goes pushing tamely at a length ball coming in outside off, looked to drop just in front of a diving slip
clipped in the air towards midwicket as he bowls it fuller
eases a fuller one pats the non-striker, good timing but mid off gets to it
tries to punch off the back foot from a length, cannot get it past extra cover
this time it is a touch shorter and he will get the single to long off with the punch
tossed up defended off the front foot
guided off the back foot to backward point

that is a lovely delivery, tossed up and going in with the angle, he has bowled that delivery well, he goes pushing inside the line looking for some sharp turn, there isn't any, and Taibu takes a neat catch
gets well forward to smother a length ball with the turn on the leg side
slanted across the angle, similar to the one that Nafees pushed at, Shakib carefully pats it away
Elton has got the angle going nicely across the left hander, Shakib is surprised as this one bounces from a length, and he edges it past the man at widish slip
now he goes for the yorker around off, Shakib jams down his bat at it and gets it to third man
gets forward and pushes a touch away from the body to defend towards point
pushes a length ball off the back foot towards extra cover
nicely forward again, and calmly blocks one hurled in fuller with the angle
turns away from a fuller length on middle and is pushed down the track from the crease
smacks the drive off a fuller one to extra cover
goes on the back foot but slaps it to extra cover again
struck on the pads but that would have gone down leg as Zimbabwe appeal for lbw
pushed off the front foot but cannot get the run as extra cover gets to it
tossed up, turning away, he initially looks to come on the front foot, sees it going away and then bends the knee to work it in front of square leg
tries to launch in to one outside off, not short enough, not wide enough, mistimes to covers
pushed off the front foot towards covers
slants it in and it zips in to the batsman off a length, who keeps it out with a straight bat
pushes away from the body, touch too early, and almost hits it straight back to the bowler, bounces just in front of him
and again, he goes pushing at a much fuller one, this one goes down well in front of the bowler who tries to tumble to his left and take it
shuffles to squeeze the push back to the bowler off a very full length
pushed back down the track off a length
tucks him up with a length ball right on middle, he shuffles and nudges it towards square leg
fine pull, he gets on top of a short ball and smacks it in front of square leg, there is a short midwicket in place but it was hit far to his right
forces a length ball off the back foot wide of cover
gives him another short ball, this one rises a lot more, and he withdraws out of the pull in the end and bends to allow it zip over his head
length ball sitting up, pushed off the back foot to mid off
ending with the angle from over the stumps on middle, he gets bat and pad together to defend
tucks him up again with a tight line, pushed back to the bowler as he shuffles across
full on the pads and he works it behind square leg
pushes lamely away from the body, just hangs the bat out at a fullish one, fortunately for him it goes wide of point to third man
he has bowled a lot better today, full around the stumps, pushed firmly to mid off
another tight delivery on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
he looks to get well forward initially, sees this one pitched full and blocks it carefully
shuffles and plays out a length ball towards cover

another fine pull, second time he has played the shot, and gets his second boundary, in front of square leg, and well past the man at deep square leg, goes back and gets in to a good position for the shot
too short this time and he goes down under it
he is a touch uncertain on the front foot again, length ball some way outside off, he takes a step out and hangs the bat at an angle to get beaten
is a touch uncertain again, and goes half-forward to keep out a full delivery as Mpofu targets the stumps
pushes on the up and gets the single wide of mid off
he comes forward and is not in control as he squeezes a fullish one past the non-striker, mid on gets to it with a slide
couldn't get straighter that that, Shakib drives off the front foot and goes in to the stumps at the non-striker's end
comes in this time from outside off, he stays in the crease and pushes to extra cover
uses the angle and nudges a length ball off the pads wide of long leg, he looks lot more comfortable when he plays from the crease
Shakib goes for the big swing over midwicket off a full delivery, just scythes through the line but long on runs to his left and gets to it
gets forward and across to push down the track
turning in from a length, played out to midwicket
played out with the turn to midwicket again
guides it in to the gap between cover and point for a couple, nicely done
pushed back down the track
whips a fuller one with the turn through square leg
right on off to begin with, pushed off the front foot
defended off the front foot, Price on target again
goes on with the angle, he gets back to whip off the pads in front of square
hurries on off a length, he is hit on the pad as he misses the work on the leg side
gets forward and tries to push down the ground, Price makes lot of ground to his right, dives and stops the ball, some effort that
pushed off the back foot to short extra cover
short, turning in from outside off, and he rocks back to slam if in the gap at cover, Sibanda goes haring after it, puts in the sliding stop to save the boundary
turning away from leg stump, he stays in the crease and tucks it square for a single
shuffles forward and eases a tossed up ball with the turn to long on, he is looking pretty solid now
flighted full, around middle and leg, Shakib forces it along the ground to long on
solidly punched off the back foot to the bowler
tossed up from wide of the crease, he comes well forward and smothers it completely, well done
shortish and sliding across the left-hander, who goes back  and cracks it past point
gets forward to defend one pushed through on middle and leg
tries to work one off the pads, straight to square leg
sharp run, mid off is deep, he pushes in front of that man, and takes off right away
makes lot of room outside leg but smacks it straight to extra cover
pushes off the front foot and picks up the run to long off
whipped off the pads but midwicket gets to the ball to his left with a dive
would have been close had extra cover picked up the ball cleanly, Shakib was coming across for the single after a firm push to that man
pushed away from the body, Price lets it rip from extra cover, Taibu gets some extra bounce and they take the overthrow
worked to square leg for a single
played out to point
pushed off the back foot past the non-striker, but Price gets to it with a dive
tries to go over midwicket with a slog sweep, gets it along the ground to the man in the deep
makes room, he has being doing that against the spinners, but Price follows him and he almost chops it on
pushed down the ground to long on
tossed up again, he is well forward in defence
defended off the front foot as he flights it up again
bowled full around the pads, he whips it in front of square leg
eases a fullish one, a touch away from the body wide of mid off
chopped from the crease in front of point
worked down to long on as he gets forward to a pitched up ball
tries to work with the angle, but gets it straight to midwicket
forced from the crease, now he finds the man at mid off
does not get up much as it is pushed through outside off,  cut to point
makes room but again finds point with a cut off middle
worked square on the leg side off the pad
played out to midwicket
tossed up quicker through the air, he comes forward to smother it
finds some bounce off a flighted one around middle, he is well forward in defence

quick single stolen but there was a chance of a run-out, bowled it full on middle and Shakib drove it to mid-on, raced through for a single but it would have been interesting had the fielder picked it up cleanly and aimed accurately
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it into the leg side
full on the off, driven neatly through the line to mid-off
shortish outside off, cut away wide of third man for a couple of runs
short on leg stump, it's pulled down towards fine leg for one more

he's given him! Swung in, Vitori has struck again, landed outside off and shaped in, nipped back further after pitching and Shakib was caught on the off stump, struck in line and the umpire had no hesitation
pushed off the back foot down to long on, midwicket could not get to it in time
shuffles across to pat it off the back foot to the bowler
gets forward to defend one going across him
played out to midwicket
good one, sliding across with the angle, he pushes inside the line for the turn, it isn't there
pushed away to covers off the front foot
widish length ball pushed off the back foot to cover
he goes for the pull and gets it over midwicket, he has played that shot well, not in as much control this time, but wide of the man in the deep
fuller one slanted in on leg stump, he clips it straight to midwicket
goes for the drive on the up but extra cover dives and saves some runs
gives him a short ball that climbs in with the angle, he goes deep in the crease and keeps it down softly, well played, this guy is looking good, pity there isn't much batting left
keeps strike with a nudge with the angle in front of square leg
pushed to the right of the non-striker, Price gets to it
now the slog sweep, got everything right on this one, went down and picked it up nicely over midwicket, nothing desperate about that shot
nudged fine down leg off the pads
Razzak rightly gets off strike quickly with a tuck in front of square leg, Price a touch shortish this time
pushes a tad away from the body, that is one thing he will need to work on, no harm done as he gets it past Price to long off
tossed up slowly on off and blocked off the front foot
they seem to be troubled by him almost every time today, even Nasir, who has batted so well, plays a loose waft outside off to get beaten
shortish and in to the body, swung away through square leg
fuller one pushed off the front foot down the ground
another fullish one swung hard down to long on
gets forward and eases this wide one along the ground, but cannot beat a diving shortish extra cover
slanted in from wide of the crease, he has absolutely dead-batted that off the back foot, dies down limply at his feet
worked away from around middle and off through square leg as Price drops it a touch short
gets around a tossed up ball and pushes to extra cover
played out towards midwicket
worked off the pads to square leg
too short, and going in with the angle, he has pulled well, and does so again, rocks back and smacks it way over midwicket
opts to play off the back foot as this one hurries on from a length, he hurriedly jabs it to midwicket
short, wide, turning further away and Razzak slaps it hard off the back foot past extra cover
a touch close to the stumps, but he still gets the cut in the gap between cover and point
Utseya runs to his left and puts in an acrobatic dive but cannot prevent the single to long off
chopped right from off stump but cannot get it wide of short third man, wants the single but is rightly sent back
slammed off the front foot down to long off
short and outside off, he cuts behind point and the man at sweeper gets to it as it slows down
shortish from Price again, and he pulls it past midwicket
short again but Price redeems himself with a dive to his right to stop the single
now a low full toss and he cannot prevent the single this time as he pushes it straight down the ground
slid flat and quick across the left-hander, he misses as he looks to steer it
clobber! Razzak did this to Price in the Test, tossed up, he bends the knee and smacks it way over the bowler's head
goes for it again, towards deep midwicket this time, it was in the air for a while but Mpofu in the deep did not seem to pick it
played with the turn to midwicket
cut off the back foot to deep point and that is a very fine 50 on debut for Nasir, he gets applause from the dressing room, he has shown superb maturity
fired wide down the leg side
worked towards midwicket
plays late, with the turn, off the back foot, easy single to long on
swept away to deep midwicket for a couple
played towards point for a single
round the wicket to the left-hander, low full toss on middle, driven past midwicket for a single
low full toss on middle, worked away but straight to midwicket this time
smacks it really hard does Nasir, full toss once more, three in a row, smotes it hard past midwicket for a boundary, fiercely struck
held it back a little, in the direction of midwicket once again
appeal for lbw, on middle and off, gets across to turn it square, is struck high on the pads, did he get an inside edge? The umpire thought so, a single to the score
comes down the pitch and clips it past midwicket for a single to keep strike
he goes for the pull again off a slower short one, and mistimes it, but gets it just over midwicket
nicely bowled from round the stumps, fires in the yorker, and he tries to squeeze it away, misses, and the ball somehow misses off stump as well
nudged off the pads behind square leg
well played, width outside off stump, he arches back  and steers it past a diving short third man, how well has he played, gets better and better
well forward now to a length ball and takes off for the single even as he pushes towards cover
fired in full near the blockhole, he goes after it with a big heave and gets it down to long on
shuffles and works a length ball with the angle to long on

he has hit it straight to long on, end of a superb knock on debut, Nasir went for the big lofted shot over long on, seemed to have absolutely creamed it, but long on took a well-judged catch right on the boundary, Vitori just needs to turn up and right away a wicket falls
that will go in to the boundary, it was bowled down the leg side, Razzak had a big go at it, but missed it, got it off the pads and in to the fine leg boundary
fuller one smacked down to long on
pushed away to point
sliding on the pads from round the wicket and well wide of the crease, rolls behind square leg
went for the big drive from outside off, beaten
steered to third man as he gets some width outside off
poor throw, it was swung hard, midwicket got to the ball and had the throw been on target at Taibu's end, it could have been more trouble for Bangladesh
tries to belatedly work a rising delivery, misses it completely as he hops in the air
gets on top of a short and wide one and cuts it to third man
walks outside off stump and lifts a length ball in front of square leg, the man from the deep runs hard and puts in the dive to haul it in, and deep midwicket is around as well to throw it back
pushes a back of a length ball coming in from round the wicket, and takes the single as the ball goes towards covers

another five-for for Vitori, international cricket is turning out to be a cakewalk for him, Razzak backs away outside leg and has a swing, misses, Vitori uproots off stump with a full delivery and takes off in celebration

the innings is over with 15 deliveries to go, a mindless run out, pushes a full delivery towards extra cover and just takes off, non-striker takes a couple of steps too but then holds his hands up, but Rubel has too much momentum in to the run, and has no chance of getting back as the throw comes in to Taibu

inn2.comm: nippy length delivery some way outside off first up, quietly left alone
well bowled, holding its line outside off stump after coming in with the angle, cautiously blocked off the front foot
coming in with the angle from back of a length, he shuffles across but works it straight to midwicket
good leave outside off, Shafiul is working up some pace and getting in to dart in with the angle on a fuller length
first run for Zimbabwe, as Taylor bends the knee and goes hard at a wide delivery, gets it to third man
lively pace from Shafiul, hits his bat from a length, carefully defended from the crease
slings it in full from wide of the crease, good one first up, he gets bat down in time to flick it to long leg
going straight on outside off from a wider line, left alone easily
gets it right this time, fired in on a fuller length on the stumps, carefully kept out
some width outside off and gets it to lift and bite, pushes in the air off the back foot, there is no one at gully though and it goes to third man
tight delivery again, around off on a length, defended down the track

chance for a run out, would have been tight had he hit, Taylor was on the back foot as he pushed in front of midwicket and took off, the fielder got to the ball and lobbed in the under-arm throw at the non-striker;s stumps as he dived forward, but missed
left alone outside the off stump as Shafiul continues to work up some pace
straightish one outside off stump, another leave from the batsman
gets it to move away, but wide outside off and left alone again
makes him play with the angle in to him, Taylor wanted the run again as he pushed towards mid on, but this time he was sent back early
straightening from a length outside off, nippy delivery, he opens the face to defend towards covers
edged and gone, Shafiul has struck, he kept pegging away outside off stump on a length, Taylor pushed at it, and the edge flew straight and low to second slip
pushed off the back foot to mid off
Rubel cranking up the pace and hurling a fullish one, blocked down the track
short, bouncing wide outside off, he looks to force it off the back foot, goes hard at it and gets it over the slip cordon
now this one moves in from outside off stump on a length, and keeps low too, he ends up pushing outside the line from the crease
played out on the off side from the crease, this is a good start from Bangladesh
slung in to the batsman with the angle on a length, defended down the track
moving away from the right-hander from a very full length, he does not go after it and leaves
this one comes in sharply with the angle, superb bowling, he is hurried in to a defensive jab
another one that does not get up much from a length, Masakadza pushes at it and the ball goes beneath the bat, fortunately for the batsman, outside off stump
driven to short extra cover off the front foot
holding its line outside the off stump, he gets forward and pushes with an open face towards point
another one moves away from close to the off stump, he resists the temptation to drive and leaves it alone
length ball close to off stump, nothing much to work with, pushed off the back foot to mid off
well bowled, pitched up for the drive, he takes a step across and leaves it alone
persists with the line outside off stump, and brings about another leave from the batsman
this one is fired in fullish around middle and leg, he shuffles to work it in front of square leg
thuds in to the bat from a fuller length, there has hardly been any loose delivery, close to off stump, and he shuffles to defend
fine shot, works it with the angle off the pads in front of square leg, Shafiul shows excellent commitment by charging to his left from long leg and sprawling along the ground to stop the boundary
sees width and throws his bat at it but it moves further away to be called a wide
forward in defence to block a fuller one towards mid off, head on top of the ball, crouching low,  solid
starts to come forward again, Shafiul keeping it close to off stump, and he adjusts as it begins to hold its line, and he blocks it on the off side
inside edge on to pad as he hurls it in with the angle on a length
rare loose delivery and he has put it away, short and wide, he cracks it past point
this one came back in with the angle, kicked from a fuller length, Masakadza was surprised and took bottom hand off the bat as he pushed forward to defend
shuffles forward and plays out a straightish length ball towards covers
superb pull, Rubel tries the short ball, gets good pace on it, but Sibanda picks it up early, and goes back to smash the pull through midwicket
pushed in front of point softly and the single is on
goes hard at the punch off the back foot, thickish edge flies to third man along the ground

Masakadza almost gets himself run out, direct hit and he was gone, it was pushed in front of cover and he took off, there was no run at all, and he turned back and put in the dive, wouldn't have helped him had the throw hit
banged in short, too short, says the umpire
fuller one outside off blocked solidly off the front foot
played out to short midwicket with the angle
going on the pads from wide of the crease and worked past square leg
that has gone past mid off, standing tall in the crease and punching a length ball hard, timed it well enough to beat mid off's dive
struck on the pad as he pushed forward, the ball came in with the angle, hit him outside the line of off and looked to be a bit of bat as well, Bangladesh appeal is turned down
played out towards short midwicket
slower one, he tries to cut it past point, Nasir at backward point gets quickly to his left, gets some bad bounce and goes tumbling backwards as he stops the ball
worked with the angle with a whip past midwicket
shuffling forward with a big backlift and pushes a full ball to deep mid off
whoa, that is a superb stroke, Sibanda shows the way again against left-arm spin, uses the feet well immediately, gets to the pitch and eases it past extra cover with a lovely followthrough
tossed up slowly and defended off the front foot
floated full and wide down leg
even bigger followthrough, Sibanda down the track again, to the pitch again, and lofting it this time way over extra cover with the turn, just sees a bit of air and dances down right away
his response is to fire it in full, and has Sibanda carefully patting it back
another one fired in full, in to the pads, rolls away on the leg side
that will disappear, shortish and wide outside off, sitting up, he had enough time to rock back and thump it through cover
tries to work it with the angle on the leg side, takes it on the pad and the ball rolls away in front of square
that could have been close as he bowled it full on the stumps, but Masakadza got bat in front of pad and timed the ball superbly through midwicket
the bite is going from the Bangladesh bowling slowly as a worked single through square leg brings up 50 for Zimbabwe

they have been a touch all over the place with their running, drops a slower one in front of point and comes charging out, sent back by the non-striker and has to apply the brakes and turn around quickly
length ball pushed with an open face towards point
fired in full from wide of the crease, pushed off the front foot
short and wide, turning away, he cuts it hard through point but it slows down and is pulled back inside the boundary
squeezes a very full delivery fired in  outside off behind point
slows it down and he pushes it down the track, in the air for a while
pushed off the front foot on the off side
good comeback from shakib, tossed up around off, and has him forward in defence
fullish one turning in, pushed down to long on off the front foot
Utseya got success with such deliveries, flighted outside off and went straight on, batsman missed, keeper missed it as well
turns it well down the leg side this time
tossed up, worked with the turn to square leg
quicker in to the stumps and keeping a bit low, clipped through midwicket
slowly turning in from outside off, played out towards midwicket
turning in quickly around leg stump, cannot work it past square leg
sliding on the pads, he shuffles and nudges it to short fine leg
looks to come down the track, he bowls it flat on a length, punches back to the bowler
another flat delivery pushed back to the bowler
defended on the off side off the front foot
RAhim appeals as he his hit on the pads with one pushed through quickly, that was clearly going down leg
pushed off the front foot down the track
is that a drop? it turned in slowly and he cracked it straight down the track, Mahmudullah flew to his right, but did it carry? Hard to tell without replays
swings on a leg for the pull but hits it straight to square leg
pushed towards midwicket
worked off the back foot and gets it wide enough of midwicket for a single
tossed up outside off this time, bit of an inside edge as he gets forward to defend
too full this time and he eases it with the turn to long on
whips a flat and quick one off the pads behind square leg
goes for the sweep but misses this one down the leg side
tossed up outside off, pushed off the front foot to extra cover

missed stumping, was a touch chance, Shakib managed some turn as he came down the track, got beaten in flight, but got a bit of pad on it, and Rahim could not collect as the ball went to his right, and towards short third man
hit in to the leg side for a single
defended off the front foot
goes flat down leg again, and he is cross that he missed with the sweep
drops it short and he cracks the pull violently, will get only a single to deep square leg though
turning a long way and down the leg side
played off the front foot with the turn to square leg
they are getting away, beaten in flight as he charges down and looks to swing with the turn on the leg side, misses but manages to get some body on it to take it past RAhim
whipped with the turn off the back foot to midwicket
short and going straight on, he slaps it off the back foot to extra cover, slight misfield there
worked off the pads straight to midwicket
this time he works it past the man at midwicket, and even comes back for the second
straightening around off stump, goes forward to defend
comes down the track, he drags it back and he has to defend again
shortish but he cannot work it past square leg
this time he manages to force it off the back foot, in the air for a while but past midwicket
lunges forward and defends down the track
too short and flat, going in with the angle, but he launches the pull straight to deep midwicket
beats him with the one that goes straight on outside off stump
lunges forward and eases the tossed up ball past the non-striker to long on
tries to force this one off the front foot down the ground, it turns in and he cannot get it away
pushed through quicker and he pushes it to point
comes down the track, he bowls it flat and quick, pushed away to midwicket
can't get this one away as well, forced off the back foot to the bowler
shortish and he goes back to push it down to long on
lunges forward and gets it off the inside edge in front of square leg
comes down the track, but he sees that and shortens it, Zimbabwe getting a touch impatient
bowls it full and he easily drives down to long off
pushes in the air off the back foot, but it was well wide of the bowler and went down to long on
well played, they are trying to go after the spinners every now and then, succeed this time, down the track again, not to the pitch but reaches out to lift it over midwicket
worked with the sharp turn in to the pads behind square leg, two men after it, but they have run four, I don't quite know how they have managed it, superb running
tossed up and turning in, gets well forward to defend down the track
makes some more effort, reaches out to a fuller one and drives hard to long on

Rahim gets the stumping, Mahmudullah gets another one to go straight on, tossed it up generously, lures him out of the crease for a push inside the line expecting the turn, and Rahim does not mess up this time
turning in from a length outside off, pushed back down the track
flighted again outside off, he gets to the pitch and drives to mid off
is met with an emphatic drive as he bowls a straight length ball outside off, gets it wide of sweeper cover
seemed to come back in a shade as he went back to force it towards extra cover
good pace from Rubel, hit hard in to the ground on the off side
marginally short, he goes for the pull right away, and gets it in front of square leg
comes in from back of a length, not sharply enough to hurry the batsman though, defended off the back foot
walks forward and across and defends with a bit of bat and pad on it, Rubel asks the question, clearly stretching the limits of optimism with Taibu comfortably outside the line of off
stretching well forward to defend down the track
hurrying on from a length, as he remains on the back foot, has to quickly get bat down to block
gets out side the crease a bit to defend a fullish one
another one blocked off the front foot, he has bowled well
comes down the track and drives in the air, on the bounce to long off
flat one pushed through quicker, played out off the back foot towards square leg
short and wide, but he reaches out to crack it straight to point, going straight on from Rubel, still no alarming movement
another one going straight on a length outside off, forced away to sweeper cover
tries to fire it in full but it goes way down leg
watchfully half-forward to defend a length ball on the off side
slashes a pacy length ball, Taibu wants the single to get off the mark, but point makes him wait as he gets to the ball quickly
this time he gets the single, to cheers from the crowd, staying beside the line and steering to third man
on top of a fullish one and blocking on the off side, they can't get the single
cautiously pushed with the turn to midwicket
bowled quicker and fuller, he gets bat and pad close together to defend
Taibu cannot get it away, short and turning in, he works it straight to midwicket
pushes half forward to midwicket
whoa, that is out of nowhere, Taibu stretches out and gets to a widish full one, and whacks it all the way over extra cover, clatters in to the advertising boards
defended off the front foot back towards the bowler
tries to work him off the pads but cannot get bat to ball
this time he shuffles and works it to long leg to bring up 2000 ODI runs for himself
wide outside off, Taibu is playing carefully and guides it straight to point
steered down to third man, Rubel not getting that dangerous inward movement still, and bowling wide outside off to concede the single
this time he targets the stumps with a full delivery, but Sibanda is waiting, gets forward and brings down a straight bat to send the ball racing past the bowler
short one outside off left alone
played out  to midwicket
Taibu sends it over long off boundary this time, he tosses it up, Taibu gets to it, bends the knee and whacks it over the infield
defended off the front foot
now he carefully squeezes a fullish one on the off side
worked off the pads but straight to square leg
pushes in the air, but wide and short of extra cover who gets to his right to cut off the single
comes in a touch from wide outside off, he stretches forward to smother it

whoa, Sibanda brings up his half-century with a dismissive lofted shot straight over the bowler's head, full delivery and he just lifted it with a straight bat, again he has been the one to take the attack to Bangladesh after the early wicket
pushed down the ground for a single
defended down the track off a length
gets on top of a bouncing delivery to steer to third man
too short, left alone outside the off stump
worked in to the leg side from the crease
fastish one turning in full on the pads, swept to short fine leg
turning in around leg stump, he takes it on the pad as he comes forward
full on middle, played with the turn to square leg
down the track and pushed firmly past the diving bowler to long on
finds some turn from around off again, and he is hit on the pad
nudged quietly to square leg, fine first over from the debutant
floated up full, pushed down the track
down the track, gets too close to the pitch, and lifts it in the air in the direction of long on
worked straight to square leg
defended with an open face on the off side
shuffling about in the crease but can only push it down the track
finds some turn now from a length, Taibu comes down the track, sees the shortened length, and even as it is turning past him, he manages to dab it to backward point
that one kept low, but he clipped it well off the pads and got it past midwicket
gets forward and nudges in front of square leg for a single
slows it up, he tries to work it square but has to push it on the off side in the end
fuller one, he comes down and clips through midwicket
short and sitting up, he cracks the pull square on the leg side, another couple of runs taken
gives him another short ball, and Sibanda gets the pull in the right area this time, hits it hard past midwicket, wide of the man in the deep
pushes a full one from leg stump back to the bowler
inside edge to shortish midwicket as he presses forward
a touch quicker now, and around middle, he stretches well forward to defend
played out towards midwicket
cannot get the punch past the man at mid on as he goes on the back foot
shortish, flat and wide, and he gets the cut past the infield
tossed up well outside off, he squeezes it past point
opens the face as he gets forward, finer than he would have liked probably, past the keeper
pushed out on the off side
full delivery, easy single to long on with a firm push
turns in slowly, and he nudges it towards square leg
goes deep in the crease to defend a length ball back to Ashraful
pushed off the back foot to long on, Bangladesh seem to be going through the motions
short, flat and hurrying on, hit straight to mid on as he rocks back
pushed towards extra cover off the back foot
slanted in full from wide of the crease, defended carefully off the front foot
comes down the track and goes hard at a fuller one, hits it hard in to the ground and over the bowler, long off runs to his right and rips the throw to hit the non-striker's stumps
Taibu isn't looking tentative now, uses his feet to a tossed up ball and swings well to find the deep midwicket boundary
turning in fullish, nudged with the turn to square leg
coming in quickly, he presses forward and gets it towards midwicket

Sibanda is gone, Ashraful gets the breakthrough, down the track to a tossed up ball, got too close and almost yorked himself, squeezed off the inside edge on to pad and the ball rolled to Rahim who found him well short
goes for the drive through extra cover, off the inner half towards mid on
flighted ball eased with the turn to long off, and Ervine is away
now Taibu slithers down the track but finds midwicket with the push
pacy delivery blocked down the track from the crease
slanted across him, he punches off the back foot towards covers
finds extra cover with the punch this time, timed well but straight to the man on the edge of the circle
around middle on a length, shuffles to push without any followthrough to mid on
goes around middle and leg again, a touch fuller, and worked to mid on
nippy fullish one around off stump, kept out with a solid block from the crease, Zimbabwe can afford to have a few quiet overs
sneaks in past the forward press and hits him on the body as Ashraful finds bounce and turn
eased down the ground to long on this time
tossed up, he pushes forward with the turn to long off
Taibu comes down the track, gets around a flighted ball and launches it with the turn over midwicket, almost went all the way
he dances out again, but this time the ball is much fuller and he works it to midwicket
short and wide outside off, and Taibu latches on to it and cuts it through point
forward to one going across and opens the face to run it down to third man
goes for the stumps with a fuller length, but Taibu is solidly on top of it to keep it out
again he hurls it in full with the angle, he carefully blocks
gets it to bounce a tad from a length outside off, he goes forward and opens the face to run it to third man
pushes one slanted across straight to widish mid off
well bowled, slower one around off, he is already forward and adjusts to play it towards point
back of a length and on the pads, easily worked to the leg side for a single.
flighted on off from round the stump, Ervine leans out to defend.
similar line, holds the length back a touch and he defends again after leaning out.
ah, uppish. Ahraful tosses it up and Ervine pops it almost right back at him. Lands just short as he dives to the right.
better from Ervine, keeps the bat angled down as he defends.
and again, moves behind the line and blocks.
pushes a length ball out towards covers
bowled fuller this time outside off, he plonks front foot out, and bends low as he pushes towards mid off
fired in full on the pads, he almost pops it to midwicket, but gets the push past him ultimately
blocked solidly on the off side, Rubel can't find the same zip and movement that he did in the first game
struck on the pad this time as he pushes forward, it pitched outside leg and was going across at an angle
Zimbabwe in no hurry at all, Ervine blocks a length ball on the off side again
short, flat and turning in, he waits but cannot guide it in the gap, point cuts it off
Ervine continues to block and block, defends on the leg side this time off the front foot
tossed up from round the wicket and defended down the track
now he feels the need for some runs, comes down the track but eases it straight to mid on
Ervine gets a run finally, down the track again and gets the push past Ashraful on the off side
backs away and cuts in the air, short third man dives in front but cannot get to the ball, it carries on past him in to the boundary
on the pads from back of a length, he shuffles and gets it behind square leg
chop a fullish one in to the crease and it goes towards the keeper
spirits forward and guides a nippy length ball past point
that is a solid push, there were three men in that area, and he has timed the shot between short extra cover and cover
hurries him in to the short-arm pull with the short one, he goes hard after it and gets it in front of square leg in the air
Ervine can't get a run at the moment, he is just content to get half-forward and block anything around the stumps
turning in and bouncing, hits him high on to the pad
can't work him on the leg side again as he misses and takes it on the pad again
defended off the front foot
quicker and played with the turn towards short fine leg

dropped, lots of cheering around the ground as deep midwicket settles under a dolly, straight in and pops straight out, it is Mahmudullah, Taibu had got on the knee and cracked the slog sweep in the air straight to him
Ervine defends resolutely again, off the front foot
pushed with an open face, wide of point who gets to it, Taibu wants the single but has to rush back as the throw is fired in
Ervine plays something apart from a defensive push, punches neatly but a good stop at mid off gives him only a single
defended off the front foot on the off side

Taibu shows how it is done, slithers forward and guides with superb timing past point, he even comes back for the third, but there's more timing, the ricochet off a direct hit goes in to the boundary, and the cheers for his 50 only get louder
short delivery banged in down leg
Taibu gets to the pitch of a full and wide one, he is middling these solid little pushes well, gets it past the man at extra cover who lets it go through
even Ervine gets in to the act, sees one on leg stump and works it through square leg
Taibu brings up victory for Zimbabwe with a hungry pull in front of square leg, sees it dropped short, rocks back and latches on to it quickly
